Logistics is a walk in the park when you do it with us

Discover the full range of transportation services tailored to fit every client's need and deliver all types of goods reliably, on time and anywhere.

about us

We are logistics and cargo shipping professionals

We continuously improve our service for supportive cooperation and getting any load to the required destination. Hugo Hunter's philosophy is to solve logistics issues and provide information to our clients. We provide individual transportation solutions, whether simple or complex, for various businesses throughout the US ensuring problem-free delivery of any cargo.

Our specialists do their best to meet our clients' needs. Please visit our website and blog for latest news and updates.

Competitive advantage of Hugo Hunter

Tailored Solutions

Each shipment is unique. Depending on your requirements or limitations, we will recommend the most effective & efficient solutions that work regardless of the situation in the market

Professional Team

We take pride in the excellence of the service provided and build long-term relationships with our clients. We are always ready to meet your every need in the most productive and secure way possible.

Reasonable prices

We are time-efficient and сost-effective. This is what defines the success of any business task we partake in. Each solution from Hugo Hunter is based on the ideal balance between these two factors.

Tailored Solutions First we make sure the cargo is fitted securely on the vehicle. Then, we oversee the loading and transportation of items, as well as the compliance with all federal regulations, until the time they are delivered to the consignee.

From the moment our team receives your freight, it goes through several important steps to ensure maximum safety.

Our Services

We are logistics and cargo shipping professionals

Our strengths let us undertake transportation and logistics of complex solutions both for businesses and private customers, including but not limited to:

  • Packing and delivering goods from containers
  • Transportation of containerized goods
  • Haulage of oversize cargo
  • Transportation and delivery of challenging, temperature-sensitive loads

Less Than Truckload

Don't have a lot that needs to ship? No problem! We can handle that too.

Temperature Controlled

Need your goods shipped at a certain temperature? We can do that!

Full truckload

The most cost effective way to ship things. We can do anything from local to international.

Warehousing

We can store your goods securely and keep track of inventory. Oversized Loads -We have flatbed trucks and crews ready to move oversized loads.

Our Garage

Expedite and Last Mile

Best option for small and medium-sized shipments. By choosing the fastest routes and connections, we deliver goods right to your door or a chosen delivery point.

FTL and LTL

Full Truck Load (FTL) means that you order an entire truck for your load only, and regardless of the type of truck you pick, it will only be filled with your cargo.

Specialized

Depending on your freight size, requirements and specifications, we will provide you with step deck, flatbed or conestoga.
